channel.title: Webclient Worries :(
channel.description:
1.) When i try log on with my webclient, it says error connecting to server, and my server is up i could log on to it with my normal one tho, Is it because im running it off my Pc? like Localhost?
2.) Well i want to make a website to Publish the webclient onto it, like Moparisbest did, I know u can use Wamp, But how can i publish my Client.jar to that website which im currently making? without out the jar file my webclient says Could not find Class.Client.
Thanks x[)DDDD[)xD

item.title: Webclient Worries :(

1.) When i try log on with my webclient, it says error connecting to server, and my server is up i could log on to it with my normal one tho,
Is it because im running it off my Pc? like Localhost?
